$schema.description: Allows us to indicate the schema in a json data file. Allows editors to support the schema

is-robotsimulator.description: A key to indicate that this describes a Robot Simulator

name.description: A name used to describe this robot simulator to the user

description.description: Optional description of the robot class

ignore-non-existing-variables.description: If true, non-existing variables will be ignored. If false, an exception will be thrown

sample_time.description: Sample frequency of the robot simulator component

initial_values.title: Initial values
initial_values.description: Defines both the names of the joint variables and their initial value
